description:
In an effort to help tutor her nephew, Saori allowed Akira into her home and gave him private lessons. However, Akira walked in on Saori when she was changing and immediately fell in love. In one of their tutoring sessions Akira could no longer supress the emotions inside of him and expressed his love for her in the most physical way he could. He had his way with her every day and as many times as he could, finishing inside of her and eventually impregnating her. What kind of mess has she gotten herself into? What will her husband and family think?!
Source: hanime

titles.title: The Hidden Side Of My Beloved Mother
